title: Looks like Block
content:
Hi,

thought I knew this font,

big font looks like Block (Berthold) but without the "irrigularities"

Please help

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Batiself.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130727135731/http:/typophile.com/files/Batiself.jpg) | 37.03 KB |
author: Raf

comments.content:
It looks like Berthold Block Heavy to me. Maybe they smoothed it a bit when they made the logo.

I find their site so user-unfriendly, I wish they had regular font showings rather than random characters.

I agree, it is (or strongly based on) Bloc.  
I see a version by Para Type available from [FontShop.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130727135731/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=PG.107306.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=60&sampleText=batiself&sampleSize=74), but the lowercase "s" is slightly different, or maybe they outlined the face to fatten it.

Thanks guys,

I just faced the music and drew it over.
